text: "Same Damn Life" is a song by South African rock band Seether. It was released on 16 September 2014 as the second single from their sixth studio album Isolate and Medicate. The song's main riff borrows heavily from Peggy March's 1963 hit "I Will Follow Him". ==Charts== ===Weekly charts=== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" |- ! Chart (2014–15) ! Peak position |- |- |- |- |} ===Year-end charts=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" |- ! Chart (2015) ! title: Same Damn Life
